Package edu.lehigh.cse216.team24.backend

package edu.lehigh.cse216.team24.backend

    App
    The main class for the Javalin web server application.
    Buzz
     
    Buzz.CommentViewData
    CommentViewData is the data we envision sent to mobile for comments.
    Buzz.RowData
    RowData is the data we envision stored in a row on the database.

    SentData is the data we envision sent to web and mobiloe.

    CommentMedia.RowData
    RowData is the data we envision stored in a row on the database.

    RowData is the data we envision stored in a row on the database.
    Database
    Database has all our logic for connecting to and interacting with a database.
    Downvotes
     
    Downvotes.RowData
    RowData is the data we envision stored in a row on the database.
    DriveServiceValidator
     
    DriveStorageService
    Class to handle all storage request written to Google Drive
    IdeaMedia
    The IdeaMedia class manages ideamedia-related database operations including creation, reading, updating, and deleting ideas from the database.
    IdeaMedia.RowData
    RowData is the data we envision stored in a row on the database.
    Ideas
    The Ideas class manages idea-related database operations including creation, reading, updating, and deleting ideas from the database.
    Ideas.RowData
    RowData is the data we envision stored in a row on the database.
    Routes
    The Routes class is responsible for registering the HTTP routes (endpoints) used by the Javalin application, including handling GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE requests related to ideas.
    SimpleRequest
    SimpleRequest provides a format for clients to present an idea string to the server.
    SimpleRequestComment
     
    SimpleRequestUser
     
    StructuredResponse
    StructuredResponse provides a common format for success and failure messages, with an optional payload of type Object that can be converted into JSON.
    Upvotes
    The Upvote class manages upvote-related database operations including creation, reading, updating, and deleting ideas from the database.
    Upvotes.RowData
    RowData is the data we envision stored in a row on the database.
    Users
    The Users class manages user-related database operations including creation, reading, updating, and deleting ideas from the database.
    Users.OtherUser
     
    Users.RowData
    RowData is the data we envision stored in a row on the database.
